short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy access to online tools. Select your favorite online tools and create your personal toolbox

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Oltbox extension you have easy access to your favorite online tools. Just select your favorite online tools and create your personal toolbox. 

So, by adding Oltbox extension you have access to any online tool with one click!
